mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into orochi_apk (app_id, version_code, download_url, `desc`, created_on, created_by, update_on, update_by) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update orochi_apk set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version_code = #{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, download_url = #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_on = #{updateOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, app_id, version_code, download_url, `desc`, created_on, created_by, update_on, update_by from orochi_apk where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, app_id, version_code, download_url, `desc`, created_on, created_by, update_on, update_by from orochi_apk
